com.example.clock

Class actualTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.clock.actualTimer

  • public class actualTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    actualTimer is the helper class for the timer function.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      actualTimer()
      This constructor initalizes the class variables current_second, current hour, current minute to 0.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • actualTimer

        public actualTimer()
        This constructor initalizes the class variables current_second, current hour, current minute to 0. This constructor will be called in onCreate() of the timer activity
        Since:
        1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getHour

        public int getHour()
        Returns:
        int for current_hour

      • getMinute

        public int getMinute()
        Returns:
        int for minutes

      • getSecond

        public int getSecond()
        Returns:
        int for seconds

      • getRun

        public boolean getRun()
        Returns:
        boolean run

      • setHour

        public void setHour(int h)
        Parameters:
        h - int, the hour the user sets current_hour.

      • setMinute

        public void setMinute(int m)
        Parameters:
        m - int, the minute value the user sets current_minute.

      • setSecond

        public void setSecond(int s)
        Parameters:
        s - int, the second value the user sets current_second to.

      • setRun

        public void setRun(boolean r)
        Parameters:
        r - boolean, controls whether the clock runs or not. true = run, false = pause

      • reset

        public void reset()
        resets all of the time values to zero and run to false

      • updateTimer

        public int[] updateTimer(int previousHour,
                int previousMinute,
                int previousSecond)
        updates the timer, decreasing by 1 s, every 1000 ms
        Parameters:
        previousHour - int the value for the current hour which will be incremented
        previousMinute - int the value for the current minute,
        previousSecond - int the value for the current second
        Returns:
        timerValue int[] an array that contains the updated hour, minutes, and seconds values

      • timerDisplay

        public java.lang.String timerDisplay()
        Returns:
        String dispalying the formated time
